channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）周二宣布，加拿大政府将提供高达 20 亿加元（15 亿美元）的低成本融资，以加快中等收入家庭的住房建设。
item.description: The Canadian government will provide up to C$2 billion ($1.5 billion) in low-cost financing to accelerate homebuilding for middle-income families, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau announced Tuesday. trib.al/p0nrfWl

item.title: 欧元区 12 月建筑业产出增长 1.9%，创 2 月以来最高增幅
item.description: Euro-zone construction output rose by 1.9% in December, the highest increase since February trib.al/2juM2mp

item.title: 反对党领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼（Alexey Navalny）去世后，美国计划于周五公布针对俄罗斯的 "重大制裁方案
item.description: The US plans to unveil a “major sanctions package” against Russia on Friday following the death of opposition leader Alexey Navalny trib.al/dMIDjrE

item.title: KeyCorp 首席执行官 Chris Gorman 称，该公司的商业房地产贷款风险已得到控制，而这正是美国地区性银行投资者所关注的领域。
item.description: KeyCorp Chief Executive Officer Chris Gorman touted his company’s contained exposure to commercial real estate lending — an area of concern for investors in regional US banks trib.al/RKtWEff

item.title: 普林斯顿大学计划利用 4 万亿美元的市政债券市场，为其新泽西校区的资本项目融资
item.description: Princeton University plans to tap the $4 trillion municipal bond market to help finance capital projects on its New Jersey campus trib.al/RF4AuOX

item.title: 德国国有能源集团 SEFE 承诺维持与俄罗斯的天然气供应合同
item.description: German state-owned energy group SEFE pledges to keep a natural gas supply contract with Russia trib.al/ZC7wHZk

item.title: 英国财政大臣杰里米-亨特计划鼓励养老基金投资英国资产
item.description: UK Chancellor Jeremy Hunt plans to spur pension funds to invest in UK assets trib.al/QWQJHQq

item.title: 经济型航空公司易捷航空（EasyJet）在大流行病期间退出英国富时 100 指数近四年后，有望重新跻身该指数榜单。
item.description: Budget airline EasyJet is on track to reclaim its place in the UK’s FTSE 100 index almost four years after it dropped out during the pandemic trib.al/ETQzVW1

item.title: 据全美房地产经纪人协会称，与十年前相比，现在拥有住房的美国人明显增多，但黑人住房拥有率与其他种族和族裔群体住房拥有率之间的差距却越来越大。
item.description: Significantly more Americans own a home now than a decade ago, but the disparity between Black homeownership rates and those of other racial and ethnic groups has grown wider, according to the National Association of Realtors. trib.al/d4isYKm

item.title: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨表示，南非将于 5 月 29 日举行大选
item.description: South Africa will hold elections on May 29, President Cyril Ramaphosa said trib.al/iETNUcJ

item.title: 尼日利亚在一次债券拍卖中筹集了 1.5 万亿奈拉（约合 9.96 亿美元），政府提供的收益率吸引了众多投资者
item.description: Nigeria raised 1.5 trillion naira ($996 million) in a bond auction as the yield offered by the government helped lure investors trib.al/0uYUAsC

item.title: 巴克莱银行首席执行官文卡塔克里什南（C.S. Venkatakrishnan）一直在审查公司的战略。事实证明，修修补补就足够了
item.description: Barclays CEO C.S. Venkatakrishnan been reviewing his firm’s strategy. It turns out, pruning around the edges was enough trib.al/DFIAGAZ

item.title: 英国伯明翰市议会拟大幅削减预算。由于其他市议会也存在预算问题，这可能不是最后一次。与 @h_chandlerwilde 一起了解最新消息
item.description: Huge cuts are proposed for the city council of Birmingham, UK. With budget problems in other councils, it might not be the last. Get The Readout with @h_chandlerwilde trib.al/m69EZ2e

item.title: 副总统巴拉特-贾格迪奥（Bharatt Jagdeo）在接受采访时说，圭亚那正在探索将埃克森公司正在钻探的油田中蕴藏的巨大天然气资源货币化的方案。
item.description: Guyana is exploring options to monetize the enormous natural gas resources held within its oil fields where Exxon. is drilling, Vice President Bharatt Jagdeo said in an interview trib.al/MgZZf3E

item.title: 二十国集团在以色列-哈马斯战争和俄罗斯问题上分歧严重，今年可能被迫完全回避地缘政治问题
item.description: The G-20 is so divided over the Israel-Hamas war and Russia it may be forced to avoid geopolitical issues altogether this year trib.al/MgTb1D0

item.title: 挪威对欧洲能源安全的重要性在去年夏天显露无遗，当时挪威一些设施的计划外工程令整个市场感到不安
item.description: Norway's relevance for Europe’s energy security became clear last summer, when unplanned works at some of its facilities sent jitters across markets trib.al/P0ycFNC

item.title: 价值 1.4 万亿美元的美国垃圾债券市场越来越垃圾--对投资者来说，这意味着更多潜在风险
item.description: The $1.4 trillion US junk-bond market is getting junkier — and for investors, that means more potential risks trib.al/u3rRDhF

item.title: 大规模削减开支使法国政府难以筹集资金，用于向乌克兰提供多达 30 亿欧元的一揽子军事援助
item.description: Massive spending cuts have left the French government struggling to put together funding for a package of as much as €3 billion in military aid to Ukraine trib.al/zDa3EVe

item.title: 一家连续三年跑赢加拿大公司债券市场的对冲基金正在买入长期债券，因为预计加拿大央行将自 2020 年以来首次降息。
item.description: A hedge fund that outperformed the Canadian corporate bond market three years in a row is buying up longer-term notes in anticipation the Bank of Canada will make its first rate cuts since 2020 trib.al/Z6fkEKT

item.title: 巴克莱银行用四个小时公布了其削减成本、增加收入的三年计划。说到底，投资者真正关心的只有一件事：资本回报。
item.description: Barclays spent four hours unveiling its three-year plans for shedding costs and boosting revenue. At the end of the day, investors really only cared about one thing: capital returns. trib.al/ZQfd1Qt

item.title: 周五工作落后？以下是提高工作效率的 4 个建议
item.description: Lagging at work on Fridays? Here are 4 tips to improve your productivity trib.al/6RcB9G0

item.title: 宏观对冲基金和股票对冲基金今年押注日本，预测日本央行将在八年负利率之后改变政策
item.description: Macro and stock hedge funds are betting on Japan this year, predicting the central bank will shift its policy after eight years of negative interest rates trib.al/2eaPG8w

item.title: 本周在红海遭到胡塞武装导弹袭击时被船员遗弃的一艘商船至今下落不明
item.description: It’s still unclear what's become of a commercial ship that was abandoned by its crew during a Houthi missile strike in the Red Sea this week trib.al/C5kbJTv

item.title: 受并购持续升温的刺激，本周美国企业债券市场预计将有超过 500 亿美元的新债从投资级公司出售
item.description: The US corporate-bond market is expected to see more than $50 billion of new debt sales this week from investment-grade companies, spurred by the continued pickup in mergers and acquisitions trib.al/Ds7rzL1

item.title: 埃及打赌，与国际货币基金组织（IMF）达成的一项解决外汇危机的协议将有助于埃及清偿拖欠外国石油公司的款项
item.description: Egypt is betting that an agreement with the IMF to resolve a foreign currency crisis will help it settle money owed to foreign oil companies trib.al/Ygm9H7e

item.title: 打造美国电池产业面临的挑战
item.description: These Are the Challenges of Building a US Battery Industry trib.al/1gVNoLj

item.title: 学院派学者特奇尔发出警告，股市孤熊脱颖而出
item.description: Lone stock-market bear emerges from the bulls as Academy’s Tchir sounds a warning trib.al/Puy1M6L

item.title: 风险投资公司 Hack VC 募集了 1.5 亿美元的基金，专门用于加密货币行业。
item.description: Venture firm Hack VC raised a $150 million fund dedicated to the crypto industry. trib.al/QrYxNDb

item.title: 一艘载有俄罗斯旗舰产品乌拉尔原油的超级油轮已抵达委内瑞拉海岸，莫斯科正在加紧制裁和红海供应中断的情况下寻找新的买家。
item.description: A supertanker carrying Russia’s flagship Urals crude has arrived off the coast of Venezuela as Moscow looks for new buyers amid tightening sanctions and disruptions in the Red Sea trib.al/Nb61CPr

item.title: 消息人士称，阿布扎比主权财富基金穆巴达拉（Mubadala）正在考虑购买伦敦希思罗机场的股份
item.description: Abu Dhabi’s sovereign wealth fund Mubadala is considering buying a stake in London's Heathrow airport, sources say trib.al/puTQyY8
